All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AmbientLight
    This Class represents an ambient light.
    ArrayBase
    Abstract base class for array-based mathematical objects.
    ColorMap
    A ColorMap provide a list of Colors to do a color gradient.
    ColorMapFactory
    Factory to build ColorMap.
    ColorMapFactory.Maps
    Enumerates available color map in this App.
    CreateClassDiagram
    This Class create a plantUML diagram file in FILE_ENDPOINT with fields and method.
    DepthBuffer
    The DepthBuffer class implements a DepthBuffer and its pass test.
    Fragment
    The Fragment class represents an attributed 'pixel' as generated by a Rasterizer.
    GUIApp
    A GUI to display the mesh with the different shader.
    ImageWrapper  
    Light
    Interface describing a light source.
    Lighting
    The Lighting class describes a scene lighting environment.
    MathUtils
    The MathUtils class provides utility methods for mathematical operations.
    Matrix
    Matrix class.
    MenuPanel  
    Mesh
    Defines a triangle based mesh.
    PainterShader
    Simple shader that just copy the interpolated color to the screen, taking the depth of the fragment into account.
    PerspectiveCorrectRasterizer
    The PerspectiveCorrectRasterizer class extends Rasterizer to perform Perspective Correct interpolation of attributes.
    PointLight  
    Rasterizer
    The Rasterizer class is responsible for the discretization of geometric primitives (edges and faces) over the screen pixel grid and generates Fragment (pixels with interpolated attributes).
    Renderer
    The Renderer class drives the rendering pipeline: read in a scene, projects the vertices and rasterizes every faces / edges.
    RenderPanel  
    Scene
    Class that describes a simple 3D Scene: * the Mesh objects composing the scene * the World-to-Camera transformation * the Lights and their parameters This description is meant to be read form a scene description file (.scene extension).
    Shader
    The Shader class is responsible for writing final pixel color to the screen (GraphicWrapper), from a Fragment.
    ShaderFactory  
    SimpleShader
    Simple shader that just copy the interpolated color to the screen.
    SizeMismatchException
    Exception class for incorrect dimensions in arithmetic operations on Matrix and Vector.
    Texture
    2D Texture class.
    TextureShader
    Simple shader that just copy the interpolated color to the screen, taking the depth of the fragment into account.
    Transformation
    The Transformation class represents a transformation in 3D space.
    Vector
    The Vector class represents a mathematical vector and provides methods to manipulate it.
